name: Dr. L K Desai

patientStories.title: Visited for Skin Disease Treatment
patientStories.review: I visited Dr. L K Desai after suffering a lot. I went to top hospitals but got no relief for my eczema. After visiting Dr. Desai, he explained everything clearly, and I got relief with the first dose.

qa.question: Where does Dr. L K Desai practice?
qa.answer: Dr. L K Desai practices at Dr. Desai Dermacare - Skin, Hair & Laser Clinic, Sopan Baug.

qa.question: How can I take Dr. L K Desai's appointment?
qa.answer: You can take Dr. L K Desai's appointment online through Practo for an in-clinic visit.

qa.question: Why do patients visit Dr. L K Desai?
qa.answer: Patients frequently visit Dr. L K Desai for Dermabrasion, Laser Resurfacing, and Acne treatment.

patientStories.title: Visited for Acne Treatment
patientStories.review: Dr. Neha is very friendly and explains everything in detail. My acne improved within a few weeks!

qa.question: Where does Dr. Neha Sharma practice?
